#include<string.h>
#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
	char password[101];
	int f1=0, f2=0, f3=0, f4=0, i, l;
	scanf("%s", password);
	if((l=strlen(password))>=5)
	{
		for(i=0; i<l; i++)
		{
			if(password[i]>=65&&password[i]<91)
		 	{ f1=1; f4=1; }
			else if(password[i]>=97&&password[i]<123)
		 	{ f2=1; f4=1; }
		 	else if(password[i]>=48&&password[i]<=57)
		 	{f3=1; f4=1; }
		 	else if(password[i]=='_'||password[i]=='.'||password[i]==','||password[i]=='?'||password[i]=='!')
		 	f4=1;
		}

	}
	if(f1==1&&f2&&1&&f3==1&&f4==1)
		printf("YES");
	else
		printf("NO");
	return 0;	
}
